Name: AtmaSphere
About the game: Help Ballard roll through the danger filled levels towards the house of Ballerina, the love of his life! AtmaSphere is roll-a-ball game set in a medieval world filled with dangerous traps and uncertain paths! Roll all you want, but be careful not to fall off! Collect all the diamonds to impress Ballerina and pick up yellow coins for bragging points! But be careful, as you progress through the levels they become harder and more challenging, your skills will be tested by a variety of engaging traps and puzzles 30 challenging, handcrafted levels! Forgiving yet challenging gameplay! Unique visual style paired with soothing sounds of rain in the background gives a beautiful relaxing 'atmasphere' :^) With every level comes a unique, wonderful soundtrack! Steam Trading Cards Join Ballard on the adventure and overcome all nasty troubles and help them become one!
